project_overview.name: Customer Onboarding and Success Portal (COSP)
project_overview.description: A customer-facing portal that provides self-service onboarding, knowledge base access, and usage data visualization to improve customer success and reduce churn.

feature_breakdown.description: Allow customers to securely log in using their main SaaS product credentials.
acceptance_criteria: Customers can log in with their existing credentials
Secure token exchange and session management

feature_breakdown.description: Display a customized onboarding checklist based on the customer's subscription level.
acceptance_criteria: Checklist is tailored to the customer's subscription level
Customers can mark tasks as completed

feature_breakdown.description: Integrate with the existing knowledge base API to allow seamless content searching and viewing.
acceptance_criteria: Customers can search and view knowledge base articles
Articles are displayed in a responsive and user-friendly manner

feature_breakdown.description: Display a dashboard showing the customer's adoption metrics (e.g., daily active users, feature usage count).
acceptance_criteria: Dashboard displays key adoption metrics for the customer
Visualizations are intuitive and easy to interpret

feature_breakdown.description: Provide a 'Contact CSM' button that pre-populates an email or a Zendesk ticket with customer details.
acceptance_criteria: Customers can easily initiate a support request from the portal
Ticket/email is pre-populated with relevant customer information

technical_architecture.data_flow: Customers interact with the web application, which communicates with the API gateway. The API gateway then orchestrates data retrieval and processing from various backend systems, including the existing SaaS product, Zendesk, Salesforce, and the knowledge base.
security_considerations: Implement OAuth 2.0 and SAML for secure authentication and authorization
Use TLS 1.2+ for all API and data communications
Comply with ISO 27001 standards for information security management

implementation_phases.description: Deliver the core functionality of the COSP, including self-service onboarding, knowledge base integration, and usage data visualization.
deliverables: Integrated with existing SaaS product, Salesforce, and knowledge base

implementation_phases.description: Enhance the COSP with additional functionality, such as the 'Contact CSM' feature and further improvements to the user experience.
deliverables: Enhanced COSP web application with new features
Integrated with Zendesk for support ticket creation

risk_analysis.description: Complexity of integrating with multiple third-party systems (SaaS product, Salesforce, Zendesk, knowledge base)
risk_analysis.mitigation_strategy: Establish clear integration requirements and protocols early, allocate sufficient time for integration development and testing

risk_analysis.description: Potential performance issues due to high user concurrency and data processing requirements
risk_analysis.mitigation_strategy: Design the system architecture with scalability in mind, implement caching and optimization techniques, conduct load testing

risk_analysis.description: Compliance with security and privacy standards (ISO 27001)
risk_analysis.mitigation_strategy: Engage security experts early, implement security best practices, and conduct regular security audits

risk_analysis.description: Tight project timeline for Phase 1 (MVP) delivery
risk_analysis.mitigation_strategy: Prioritize critical features, optimize development processes, and allocate additional resources if necessary

tools_and_technologies: API Gateway (AWS API Gateway, Azure API Management, etc.)
Monitoring and Logging (Prometheus, Grafana, ELK Stack)
infrastructure_needs: Content Delivery Network (CloudFront, Azure CDN, etc.)
Identity and Access Management (AWS IAM, Azure AD, etc.)

success_metrics.target_value: Decrease by 5 percentage points within 12 months
Reduce from 30 days to 14 days within 6 months
success_metrics.measurement_method: Tracked through the onboarding checklist completion data

success_metrics.target_value: Reduce time spent on manual onboarding tasks by 25%
success_metrics.measurement_method: Tracked through CSM activity data and customer support ticket volumes

success_metrics.target_value: Increase to 40% of support questions resolved via the portal
success_metrics.measurement_method: Calculated from customer support ticket data
